website_summaries.verdict: Thick mousse easily covers all areas evenly.
pros: The only mousse on our list, this thick, stay-put formula makes even coverage a breeze
Works well on body and face
"Odor Remove" technology guarantees no bad "self-tanner" smell
cons: Drys very quickly, so if you make an application error, you're stuck with it

customer_reviews.title: If you’re pale, this might not work. Didn’t for me!
customer_reviews.text: This was SO disappointing. I’ve used the gradual lotion and loved it, so I thought I’d try the mousse. I followed all the directions, and ended up with so little color that you can barely tell I used it. I will have to apply it again ( it’s been two days) and hope I get more color and it doesn’t get weird like other self tanners if you reapply too soon. So for me, this was not worth the high price at ALL. I wish I had stuck with the lotion.
customer_reviews.author: VV

customer_reviews.title: Really fantastic tanner!
customer_reviews.text: Love this tanner! It produces a natural tan look with little to no tanner aroma (well, there's a little hint of tanner smell at first). This mousse is useful when applying so you can see where you’ve possibly missed, and the mousse dries within less than a minute. Be careful not to wear light colored clothing until after you’ve showered though. I usually wait 9-12 hours from application to showering, but after showering you have this natural, realistic tan that lasts 3-6 days. Obviously the areas like legs that you shave, the tan will not last as long. Side note- make sure you really exfoliate all areas you’re going to apply tanner so you have the most even tan later.
customer_reviews.author: D. Gill

customer_reviews.title: So close to perfect, so close
customer_reviews.text: I really want to love this whole-heartedly, but I’m only like 80% in love. Pros: cleanest ingredients of any tanner I’ve seen, no tanner smell as it develops (although it does smell like ACV when you apply it) easy to apply, even color and no streaks, color faded smoothly. Cons: while this is probably the my favorite final color tone of any tanner I’ve tried, the color itself isn’t as saturated as I’d hoped, even when I applied two coats; plus, two coats was SUPER sticky, and stayed sticky the entire development time; color disappeared almost entirely after 2 days so longevity is lacking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like the coloring on this one
customer_reviews.text: The whole bottle leaked all over a brand new shirt I had. That never happened before with any of the other Vita Liberata products that I have purchased. I like the coloring on this one, but unfortunately only got to use it a short time because it leaked out completely.
customer_reviews.author: J9Z

customer_reviews.title: Love the look & the ingredients!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! It has absolutely no toxic ingredients (unlike the st. Tropez stuff I was previously using) and I think I like it better than St. Tropez! Gives a beautiful glow without the smell or weird orange-y ness
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite self tanner
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased this before and love the product itself, but this particular time some of it leaked all over the bag the bottle was inside of and was a bit messy.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Clay

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Glow!
customer_reviews.text: Every time I use this I end up with a beautiful glowing tan! I'm fortunate to already be pretty tan, but I've never had any issues with streaks.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Self Tanner!!
customer_reviews.text: This absolutely the best self tanner I have ever purchased. It is easy to apply and the color is extremely natural. It has a very slight odor, but fades after a few minutes so doesn’t really bother me. It does dry quickly and produces a dark even tan. You definitely have to use a tanning glove to apply.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Very good product for natural looking tan
customer_reviews.text: Very good. Natural looking color, not a bad strong odor either. It's pretty mild. It did leak a little when I got it, but it goes on easy and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: DD1114

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting color
customer_reviews.text: No smell, goes on smoothly but use a tanning mitt. Nice tan color and stays on for a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No color deposit
customer_reviews.text: This provides almost zero color. I wanted it as a “clean” alternative while I’m pregnant. I won’t be using it. I ordered MineTan and that product works really well.
customer_reviews.author: Dimitri

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for about 3 years. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Keto Munchies

customer_reviews.title: Looks Natural
customer_reviews.text: The color is GREAT. It lasts for about 3 days..The smell is a bit overwhelming ,but you can take a shower after a few hours .The color stays smell goes away.
customer_reviews.author: wghosp

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for years and love it. It is the only self tanner that really works for me!
customer_reviews.author: Patty Herdlick

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. It stinks and barely gave any color, in spots. Thats after exfoliating
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Pretty deceiving.
customer_reviews.text: I received a bottle that wasn't sealed and half of the liquid was missing. Pretty deceiving.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Rose

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Love
customer_reviews.text: I had previously purchased the older version of the Fabulous Mousse and I love the new version. It is great because it comes out with a beautiful caramel color but goes on almost sheer. Great for when I need to head out for the day. Once it sits on my skin for 4-8 hours and I rinsed in the shower I end up with the perfect natural looking tan. Very much so improved and loved!!
customer_reviews.author: Lila

customer_reviews.title: No color, bad smell
customer_reviews.text: This product was completely useless. I followed all directions and it looks like I did nothing. I have zero tan and I stink because this product does indeed have a very strong smell. It’s so strong that a shower didn’t take care of the smell. It honestly smells worse than other self tanners I have used. At $30 I am very very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ray and Amy

customer_reviews.title: Finally an easy self tanner to use!
customer_reviews.text: Dries so quickly when applied! I actually applied after I showered in the AM and was in a rush so I wore to work to allow it to develop. No stickiness or self tanner stink! So impressed! Once developed the colour was beautiful as well, so happy I can get such a nice tan without having to damage my skin in the sun. Will definitely be trying out more Vita products! Thumbs up :)
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I've tried other self tanners & this one dries quickly, doesn't smell bad, doesn't have an orangish tint & lasts longer.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Stawrowski

product_meta.title: VITA LIBERATA Advanced Organics Fabulous Self-Tanning Tinted Mousse, Dark, 3.38 Fl Oz
product_meta.description: This super fast-drying dark tan mousse gives an instant gorgeous sheer caramel color and then develops to a beautiful natural-looking tan that lasts for up to seven days. Thanks to the quick drying formula you can put on clothes and go out within seconds of applying. The subtle, tinted mousse means it’s easy to see where you’re applying and once developed it will last up to 7 days. Certified organic botanicals and a moisture locking system nourish the skin and give 72-hour hydration while Odour Remove technology ensures no smell whatsoever.
